entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
